attributes.title: Manifest Peace In Your Being Level, Powerfulness In Doing, Intensity In Your Action || 02 Jan 2020
attributes.description:
2 JANUARY 2021, SATURDAY (IST)

*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:
*MANIFEST PEACE IN YOUR BEING LEVEL, POWERFULNESS IN YOUR DOING LEVEL, INTENSITY IN YOUR ACTION. 
*THIS IS THE MOST IMPORTANT POWERFUL ROYAL SECRET TO MANIFEST SUCCESS IN LIFE. 
*SOCIETY ALWAYS TEACHES YOU PSEUDO DIGNITY INSTEAD OF INTEGRITY. COSMOS TEACHES YOU INTEGRITY. 
*PSEUDO DIGNITY CANNOT REPLACE THE STRENGTH OF INTEGRITY. SAME WAY, PEACE AND POWERFULNESS CANNOT BE REPLACED BY YOUR IDEA OF HAPPINESS. 
*ALL THE IDEAS OF HAPPINESS TAUGHT TO YOU BY SOCIETY IS PSEUDO HAPPINESS.
*THE GOOD NEWS I HAVE FOR ALL OF YOU IS, JOY/PAIN, HAPPINESS/ SADNESS, BOTH ARE DELUSION. BOTH ARE PSEUDO IDEAS TAUGHT TO YOU BY SOCIETY. HOW IT TEACHES YOU PSEUDO DIGNITY, IT TEACHES YOU PSEUDO HAPPINESS, PSEUDO SADNESS.
*TO AVOID PAIN YOU ARE ASKED TO RUN YOUR LIFE. IDEAS OF HAPPINESS / PAIN WHICH YOU CARRY FOR WHICH YOU ARE ASKED TO RUN YOUR LIFE ARE BOTH ABSOLUTELY PSEUDO AND STUPID.
*IF YOU FUNDAMENTALLY REMOVE THE PUS FROM YOUR CORE COGNITIONS OF LIFE, IF YOU DETOX YOURSELF FROM THE IDEAS OF PSEUDO DIGNITY, PSEUDO PAIN, PSEUDO HAPPINESS, YOUR LIFE WILL BE SUCCESSFUL.
*WHAT IS HAPPINESS? THE WHOLE IDEA OF HAPPINESS AND PAIN IS JUST DELUSION.
*ANYTHING WHICH IS DEFINITE AND REPRODUCIBLE IS ONLY SCIENCE. ALL YOUR HAPPINESS AND PAIN ARE BOTH NOT REPRODUCIBLE OR DEFINITE. IT IS JUST SOME CHEMISTRY HAPPENING IN YOUR BIOLOGY LIKE ACCIDENT, SOME COINCIDENCE. SOMETIMES IT HAPPENS AND SOMETIMES DOESN'T HAPPEN. AND YOU STRUGGLE WITH THE IDEA ABOUT WHAT YOU DID EARLIER AND DO THE SAME THING AND WAIT AND BEG FOR HAPPINESS TO COME AND IT DOESN'T COME.
*SAME WAY, YOU PLAN WHAT ALL YOU DID TO AVOID SOME PAIN OR SADNESS AND YOU AVOID ALL THAT PERFECTLY BUT SUDDENLY THE SADNESS IS VIBRANT AND LITERALLY TAKING OVER AND PARALYSING YOU. 
*PEACE / POWERFULNESS IS THE REAL EXPERIENCE. THEY ARE BOTH DEFINITE AND REPRODUCIBLE. INTEGRITY IS DEFINITE. PSEUDO DIGNITY IS DELUSORY.
*PEACE IS DEFINITE. HAPPINESS IS DELUSORY. 
*POWERFULNESS IS DEFINITE. FEAR OF PAIN / SADNESS IS DELUSORY.
*THIS YEAR 2021, THIS IS MY MESSAGE. TODAY IS NOT ONLY NEW YEAR, BUT BEGINNING OF NEW DECADE OF THIS CENTURY.
*FROM SPIRITUAL ANGLE IT IS LITERALLY THE BEGINNING OF NEW YEAR AFTER THE PRALAYA - THE GREAT DELUGE.
*SO LISTEN TO THIS MESSAGE VERY CAREFULLY - THIS IS DIRECT MESSAGE FROM PARAMASHIVA FOR THIS WHOLE YEAR / DECADE / WHOLE LIFE POST PRALAYA.
*WORK MORE AND MORE TO HAVE PEACE IN YOUR BEING. 
MANIFEST POWERFULNESS IN YOUR WILL AND DONG LEVEL. 
MANIFEST INTENSITY IN YOUR ACTION. 
*THESE ARE THE DEFINITE METHODS, ROYAL SECRETS FOR MANIFESTING SUCCESS IN YOUR LIFE IN ANY FIELD. 
*DON'T GO FOR PSEUDO DIGNITY / PSEUDO HAPPINESS. DON’T BE AFRAID OF PSEUDO PAIN.
*ALWAYS LOOK FOR PEACE IN YOUR BEING LEVEL. DON’T SEEK JOY OR HAPPINESS IN YOUR BEING.
*YOUR CONSTANT DEEP YEARNING, CRAVING, ATTACHMENT TO THE JOY IS THE SOURCE OF PAIN BECAUSE JOY IS NEITHER DEFINITE NOR REPRODUCIBLE. 
*WHEN BUDDHA SAID ‘LIFE IS PAIN’, HE MEANS THIS LIFE IS ACTUALLY NOT PAIN, YOUR UNSCIENTIFIC CRAVING, YOUR DELUDED ATTACHMENT, YOUR EXTREMELY STUPID LUST FOR JOY, HAPPINESS IS THE SOURCE OF ALL PAIN.
*LOOK FOR PEACE, NOT FOR JOY. PEACE IS A DEFINITE EXPERIENCE. SHANTI IS THE DEFINITE EXPERIENCE, REPRODUCIBLE, SCIENTIFIC AND STRENGTHENING YOUR EXISTENCE, MAKING YOU FEEL MORE AND MORE GROUNDED, ALIVE, EMPOWERING YOU.
*YOUR SEARCH FOR JOY / HAPPINESS DOES NOT EMPOWER YOU. YOUR SEARCH FOR PEACE EMPOWERS YOU, GIVES YOU THE EXPERIENCE OF SUCCESS. IT MAKES YOU TASTE SUCCESS IN THE LIFE.
*BRING POWERFULNESS IN YOUR DOING, IN YOUR WILL.
*DO NOT GO AFTER PSEUDO DIGNITY, GO AFTER INTEGRITY.
*SOCIETY TEACHES YOU PSEUDO DIGNITY IN THE PLACE OF INTEGRITY. COSMOS EXPECTS INTEGRITY FROM YOU, NOT PSEUDO DIGNITY.

Read More At: https://www.facebook.com/ParamahamsaNithyananda/posts/4738018256285987



Get Your Free E-Passport at join.kailaasa.org and receive all the gifts to live enlightenment!
